class.name: GribDecoder
class.documentation: Responsible for reading and interpolating GRIB data.

parameter.name: grib_input_file_name
parameter.documentation: The name of the input file containing the GRIB code field(s)

parameter.name: grib_id
parameter.documentation: Id used to identify a grib file in the title production

parameter.name: grib_automatic_scaling
parameter.documentation: Scaling of the decoded field

parameter.name: grib_automatic_derived_scaling
parameter.documentation: Scaling of the decoded derived field. A field is considered derived if the GRIB_API key generatingProcessIdentifier is 254.

parameter.name: grib_scaling_factor
parameter.documentation: Apply a scaling factor to the field.

parameter.name: grib_scaling_offset
parameter.documentation: Apply a scaling offset to the field.

parameter.name: grib_text_experiment
parameter.documentation: Include the name or number of the experiment, used to generate the GRIB code field, in the automatic text (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: grib_text_units
parameter.documentation: Include the units of the input field in the automatic text

parameter.name: grib_file_address_mode
parameter.documentation: Normally GRIB fields are stored as records on a file. If the BYTE offset method is being used, the parameter GRIB_FILE_ADDRESS_MODE should be set to 'BYTE_OFFSET'.(RECORD_NUMBER/BYTE_OFFSET)

parameter.name: grib_wind_mode
parameter.documentation: The incoming wind field may contain data other than wind components, e.g. wave height and direction. grib_wind_mode should be set to indicate how to interpret the incoming wind field, as u/v components, or speed/direction (uv/vd).

parameter.name: grib_field_position
parameter.documentation: The position in the input file of a field other than a wind component

parameter.name: grib_wind_position_1
parameter.documentation: The position in the input file of a wind component field

parameter.name: grib_wind_position_2
parameter.documentation: The position in the input file of a wind component field

parameter.name: grib_wind_position_colour
parameter.documentation: The position in the input file of a wind component field used to colour the flag

parameter.name: grib_missing_value_indicator
parameter.documentation: When MAGICS is decoding GRIB code, this is the value to be assigned to field values where data is missing, as indicated by the bit map in the GRIB file.

class.name: GribLoop
class.documentation: The purpose of the GRIB loop is to easily create an animation. This feature is only available in MagML.

parameter.name: grib_file_address_mode
parameter.documentation: Normally GRIB fields are stored as records on a file. If the BYTE offset method is being used, the parameter GRIB_FILE_ADDRESS_MODE should be set to 'BYTE_OFFSET'.(RECORD_NUMBER/BYTE_OFFSET)

parameter.name: grib_dimension
parameter.documentation: Metview:dimension of the input : 1 for field, 2 for wind

parameter.name: grib_position_1
parameter.documentation: Metview:position of the fields for x component in the fieldset

parameter.name: grib_position_2
parameter.documentation: Metview:position of the fields for y component in the fieldset

parameter.name: grib_position_colour
parameter.documentation: Metview:position of the fields for colour component in the fieldset

parameter.name: grib_position
parameter.documentation: Metview:position of the fields to plot in the fieldset

parameter.name: grib_loop_path
parameter.documentation: Path of the grib to animate

parameter.name: grib_loop_step
parameter.documentation: Method to create the steps names for each plot of the animation

parameter.name: grib_automatic_scaling
parameter.documentation: Scaling of the decoded field (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: grib_automatic_derived_scaling
parameter.documentation: Scaling of the decoded derived field (ON/OFF). A field is considered derived if the GRIB_API key generatingProcessIdentifier is 254.

parameter.name: grib_scaling_factor
parameter.documentation: Apply a scaling factor to the field.

parameter.name: grib_scaling_offset
parameter.documentation: Apply a scaling offset to the field.

parameter.name: grib_wind_mode
parameter.documentation: The incoming wind field may contain data other than wind components, e.g. wave height and direction. grib_wind_mode should be set to indicate how to interpret the incoming wind field, as u/v components, or speed/direction (uv/vd).

class.name: DateGribLoopStep
class.documentation: Sets the parameters related to looping on dates in a GRIB loop.

parameter.name: grib_loop_step_span
parameter.documentation: Time interval

parameter.name: grib_file_address_mode
parameter.documentation: Normally GRIB fields are stored as records on a file. If the BYTE offset method is being used, the parameter GRIB_FILE_ADDRESS_MODE should be set to 'BYTE_OFFSET'.(RECORD_NUMBER/BYTE_OFFSET)
